name: Tubular! (XtraLife)
description:
This game was made for a 48 hour game jam.

OH NO, TIMMY PUT *YOU* THE GUINEA PIG IN THE MOUSE CAGE!

GOAL:

1. avoid the balls

2. watch for mouse henchmen 

3. escape the tubular cage

CONTROLS:

Up - Steers you forward 

Left/Right keys turn you

Key press "Z" sprays, which slows balls down
